parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\nFROM [staging].[OPS_Answers]',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
ConvertDate select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput alterRow(deleteIf(not(isNull(Reporting_Period)))) ~> AlterRowDelete
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> ConvertDate
AlterRowDelete sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as integer,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID','Asset_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	)) ~> DeleteRecords

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as string,
		Text_Response as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[UID]\n      ,[Attribute]\n	  ,[Answer_Number]\n      ,[Text_Response]\n      ,[Numeric_Response]\n FROM [staging].[OPS_Answers]',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as integer,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationDB
ConvertDataType derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Fund_ID,Reporting_Period,UID,Attribute,Answer_Number,Text_Response,Numeric_Response)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(UID == Relation_UID
	&& Reporting_Period == Relation_Reporting_Period
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Answer_Number == Relation_Answer_Number,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Fund_ID,Reporting_Period,UID,Attribute,Answer_Number,Text_Response,Numeric_Response)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_UID = UID,
		Relation_Attribute = Attribute,
		Relation_Answer_Number = Answer_Number,
		Relation_Text_Response = Text_Response,
		Relation_Numeric_Response = Numeric_Response,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForUpdate
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForUpdate union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
UnionForDB alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowForUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Numeric_Response = toDecimal(Numeric_Response,19,4),
		Answer_Number = toInteger(Answer_Number)) ~> ConvertDataType
AlterRowForUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as integer,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UID','Reporting_Period','Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Answer_Number'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow
